localResource.name: Storage_type
localResource.label: Storage_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_0_enum_translator_view.value, v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view, v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view, v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view WHERE v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type = v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_key AND v3_0_enum_translator_view.enum_type = 'STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE' AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.storage_domain_id = v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND (detach_date < cast($P{P_End_Date} as date) + interval '1 day' OR detach_date IS NULL) AND attach_date >= cast($P{P_Start_Date} as timestamp) $P!{Active_VMs} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT value, -1, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, value
